roleset.name: dab, apply a gloppy substance, onomatopoetically
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: all args
example.text: Part of me thinks they run a jiffy over it , splodge some of that shiney solution on the outer walls of the tyres , then slap a " for sale " sticker on it
example.arg: on the outer walls of the tyres
